modName: Dungeons and Dovahs - Standalone Race Overhaul
summary: A Standalone version of the Race Overhaul that will be featured in the upcoming Dungeons & Dovahs
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=6][i][color=#cc0000][color=#e06666][color=#6fa8dc][b]DUNGEONS & DOVAHS
[size=3]Standalone Race Overhaul[/size][/b][/color][/color][/color]
[/i][/size][img]http://www.pixelegends.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/07/skyrim_race.jpg[/img][/center][center][color=#e06666]This is a standalone version of the race overhaul that will be featured in the upcoming Dungeons & Dovahs Skyrim Overhaul Mod.
All 10 Races have been rebalanced with new and different stats, More realistic carryweights, Different starting attributes, new descriptions, more immersive names for elven races and some new abilities as well.

[size=2][color=#93c47d]
Argonian

Health 130 Magicka 0 Stamina 80

Health Regeneration 0.5% Magicka Regeneration 1.0% Stamina Regeneration 1.0%

Carryweight 130

Argonian Heritage - 75% resistance to Poison and 50% resistance to Disease

Argonian Claws - Deal 2x as much damage as a mere punch

Amphibious - Argonians swim 10% faster then other races and have Constant Waterbreathing

Power of the Hist - Increases Health Regeneration by 5X for a short time and cure's the argonian of any poison and disease effects[/color]


[img]http://uesp.net/w/images/3/39/Lore-race-Argonian.png[/img]

[/size][color=#00ffff][size=2][color=#00ffff][size=2]
Breton

Health 90 Magicka 50 Stamina 90

Health Regeneration 0.25% Magicka Regeneration 1.25% Stamina Regeneration 1.0%

Carryweight 120

Breton Heritage - 20% Resistance to Magic & 10% Weakness to Disease

Mage's Ward - absorb up to 50% of an incoming spells magicka however if any spell doesn't get absorbed they will deal 50% greater damage

Overcharge - For a short time Increase the damage output of Elemental spells by 50% at the cost of increasing their cost by 25%　


[img]http://uesp.net/w/images/c/c1/Lore-race-Breton.png[/img]

[/size][/color][/size][/color][color=#800000][size=2][color=#800000][size=2][color=#dd7e6b][color=#d5a6bd]Dunmer

Health 90 Magicka 30 Stamina 100

Health Regeneration 0.25% Magicka Regeneration 1.25% Stamina Regeneration 1.25%

Carryweight 130

Dunmer Heritage - You have a constant 25% resistance to fire

Flames of Morrowind - All fire spells cast by a dark elf deal 10% greater damage

Inferno - For 60 seconds Surround yourself in a cloak of fire that deals 10 points of damage every second ignoring enemy resistances

Ancestor Guardian - for 60 seconds summon an ancestor to fight alongside you who will level up alongside you up to level 50　[/color]
[/color]

[img]http://uesp.net/w/images/3/3e/Lore-race-Dunmer.png[/img]



[/size][/color][/size][/color][color=#ffff00][size=2][color=#ffff00][size=2]
Altmer

Health 80 Magicka 70 Stamina 80

Health Regeneration 0.25% Magicka Regeneration 1.5% Stamina Regeneration 1.0%

Carryweight 120

Altmeri Heritage - 20% resistance to Disease and 10% weakness to Magic

Altmeri Specialty - All shock spells cast by a high elf deal 10% greater damage

Arcane Infusion - For 30 seconds increase your magicka regeneration by 100% but for 45 seconds render yourself 50% weak to magic attacks

Magicka Furnace - For 30 seconds fortify your magicka supply by 200 point but at the cost of draining all your stamina for twice as long



[img]http://uesp.net/w/images/6/6d/Lore-race-Altmer.png[/img]

　
[/size][/color][/size][/color][color=#ff0000][size=2][color=#ff0000][size=2][color=#ffffff]Imperial

Health 100 Magicka 0 Stamina 130

Health Regeneration 0.25% Magicka Regeneration 1.0% Stamina Regeneration 1.75%

Carryweight 140

Imperial Heritage - Imperials have a greater chance to find more gold wherever it may be found

Star of the West - Imperials have 25% better bartering skills

Red Diamond - For a short time you can bolster your own and any allies stats to untold levels

Voice of the Emporer - For a short time you can cause  all enemies to stand down at the cost of your stamina  [/color]



[img]http://uesp.net/w/images/a/aa/Lore-race-Imperial.png[/img]
　

[/size][/color][/size][/color][size=2][color=#3c78d8][size=2]Nord

Health 110 Magicka 0 Stamina 110

Health Regeneration 0.25% Magicka Regeneration 1.0% Stamina Regeneration 1.5%

Carryweight 150

Nordic Heritage - All Nords are 25% resistance to the cold and take 25% less damage from shock magic

Frigid Veins - All Frost spells cast by a nord deal 10% greater damage

Fury of the North - Let out a terrifying roar that will send those around you fleeing in terror at the cost of draining all your stamina for twice as long[/size][/color][/size][size=2][color=#f3a447][size=2][color=#3c78d8]　



[img]http://uesp.net/w/images/f/f1/Lore-race-Nord.png[/img]
[/color][color=#f3a447]
Khajiit

Health 80 Magicka 0 Stamina 140

Health Regeneration 0.25% Magicka Regeneration 0.75% Stamina Regeneration 1.75%

Carryweight 130

Khajiit Heritage - Khajiit take 25% less damage from falls

Khajiit Claws - Khajiit Claws deal 4x as much damage as a mere punch

Like a Shadow - Khajiit are 10% harder to detect in stealth

Night Eye - Khajiit are able to see much better in the dark[/color][/size][color=#f3a447][/color][/color][color=#f3a447][/color][/size][color=#f3a447][/color][color=#8fb08c][size=2][color=#8fb08c][size=2]　


[img]http://uesp.net/w/images/a/a5/Lore-race-Khajiit.png[/img]


Orsimer

Health 120 Magicka 0 Stamina 100

Health Regeneration 0.25% Magicka Regeneration 0.75% Stamina Regeneration 1.25%

Carryweight 200

Orsimer Heritage - 15% Magic resistance

Intimidating Presence - Intimidation Checks are 25% Greater

Rage of the Orsimer - For 30 seconds you will deal double damage with each attack but take half damage however when the effect ends you will take 50 points of damage directly to your health



[img]http://uesp.net/w/images/3/3e/Lore-race-Orsimer.png[/img]


　[/size][/color][/size][/color][color=#9e7c7c][size=2][color=#9e7c7c][size=2]Redguard

Health 100 Magicka 0 Stamina 130

Health Regeneration 0.25% Magicka Regeneration 0.75% Stamina Regeneration 2.0%

Carryweight 140

Redguard Heritage - 25% Disease Resistance and 10% boost to Sprinting Speed

Sand Fury - 10% boost in speed to dual wielding attacks

Andrenaline Surge - for 60 seconds your stamina will regenerate 5x faster however when the effect ends you will take 50 points of damage directly to your health



[img]http://uesp.net/w/images/4/44/Lore-race-Redguard.png[/img]

[color=#000000]
　[/color][/size][/color][/size][/color][/color][color=#000000][size=2][size=2]Bosmer

Health 90 Magicka 0 Stamina 120

Health Regeneration 0.25% Magicka Regeneration 1.0% Stamina Regeneration 1.5%

Carryweight 110

Bosmeri Heritage - 25% Resistance to Poison and 50% Resistance to Disease

Command Animal - Make an animal your ally for up to 5 minutes

Wild Guardian - Call fourth the spirit of a mighty bear that levels up with you up to level 50 to aid you in combat

Sharp Arrow - Bosmer deal 10% greater damage with missle attacks[/size][/size]



[img]http://uesp.net/w/images/0/0e/Lore-race-Bosmer.png[/img]

[/color]
[color=#674ea7]
All Elven Races have been given their race appropriate name (Altmer, Dunmer, Bosmer) instead of the more common (High Elf, Dark Elf, Wood Elf) which no self respecting Mer would refer to themselves as such

All Vampire Races now swipe in combat instead of punch and like the elven races they too have had a name change, now where you become a vampire it won't say you are an Imperial, it will say you are a Vampire as a constant reminder that your a monster

Also a Patch for users of "Undeath immersive Lichdom" is here for anyone who wants the Lich races to use these changes
[/color][/center]
author: Tx12001

files.name: Dungeons and Dovahs Race Overhaul Immersive Lichdom Patch
files.fileName: Dungeons and Dovahs Race Overhaul Immersive Lichdom Patch-72511-1-00.7z
